character.name: Zari
desc: A greedy dragon. Her cards <c=boldPink>draw</c> and <c=boldPink>discard</c> other cards, and provide lots of <c=boldPink>defensive utility</c>.

ZariOpportunisticStatus.name: Opportunist
ZariOpportunisticStatus.desc: At the start of every turn, draw {0} extra cards. Then discard any number of cards from your hand.

OLDZariOpportunisticStatus.name: Opportunist
OLDZariOpportunisticStatus.desc: At the start of every turn, <c=status>draw</c> {0} and choose {0} to discard.

ZariScornStatus.name: Scorn
ZariScornStatus.desc: Every time you discard a card during your turn without playing it, fire a {0} damage shot.

ADiscardSelect.title: Discard Choice
ADiscardSelect.desc_single: Choose <c=boldPink>1</c> card to discard from your hand.
ADiscardSelect.desc: Choose <c=boldPink>{{cnt}}</c> cards to discard from your hand.

ADiscardFlexSelect.title: Flex Discard
ADiscardFlexSelect.desc_single: Choose <c=boldPink>any</c> number of cards to discard from your hand.

Acquire.name: Acquire
Acquire.desc: Choose a card in your <c=boldPink>exhaust pile</c>. Discard it.
Acquire.descA: Choose two cards in your <c=boldPink>exhaust pile</c>. Discard them.
Acquire.descB: Choose a card in your <c=boldPink>exhaust pile</c>. Discard it.

Seek.name: Seek
Seek.desc: <c=downside>On discard,</c> pick a <c=boldPink>draw pile</c> card to draw.
Seek.descA: <c=downside>On discard,</c> pick a <c=boldPink>draw or discard pile</c> card to draw.
Seek.descB: <c=downside>On discard,</c> exhaust and pick an <c=boldPink>exhaust pile</c> card to draw.

Peruse.name: Peruse
Peruse.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>shield</c>. Pick a card in your <c=boldPink>draw pile</c> to discard.
Peruse.descA: Gain 1 <c=status>shield</c>. Pick two cards in your <c=boldPink>draw pile</c> to discard.
Peruse.descB: Pick a card in your <c=boldPink>draw pile</c> to discard.

ZariCatEXE.name: Zari.EXE
ZariCatEXE.desc: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=e8df5f>Zari</c> cards to your hand. Discard 1.
ZariCatEXE.descA: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=e8df5f>Zari</c> cards to your hand. Discard 1.
ZariCatEXE.descB: Add 1 of 5 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=e8df5f>Zari</c> cards to your hand. Discard 1.

Temperance.name: SIMPLE BEAUTY
Temperance.desc: The first time you discard a card during your turn without playing it, gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>.

OpulantWealth.name: EXCESSIVE WEALTH
OpulantWealth.desc: Draw <c=card>+2 cards</c> every turn. At the start of combat, add 3 <c=card>Hoards</c> to your draw pile.

CrownChessPiece.name: CASTLE CHESS PIECE
CrownChessPiece.desc: Every 5 times you discard a card without playing it, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.

ShinyShield.name: SHINY SHIELD
ShinyShield.desc: Gain 2 <c=status>SHIELD</c> and 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> on the first turn.

GoldHullFinish.name: GOLDEN HULL FINISH
GoldHullFinish.desc: Every 4th time your ship is hit, draw 1 card.

Lexicon.name: LEXICON
Lexicon.desc: Whenever you gain a <c=card>Ponder</c> during combat, it is given the A or B upgrade, alternating.
